description: 816 Service Provider Fees Related to Loan Administration
extraDescription: D+H is required to administer all Canada Student Loan accounts from the initial processing of disbursements of awards to the full repayment of the loan, while ensuring the privacy and security of the borrower's information.
comments: This amendment of $5,250,000 increases the total current contract value of this 10 year contract to $549,498,313.
